title: Premium 100% All Natural Soy Wax Melt Tart - 3 oz. - Caramelized Pralines: A blend of sweet warm vanilla caramel, dark brown sugar w/ butter-drenched pecans 3 oz
features: 100% Pure All Natural Soy (US Grown) - Made With All Natural Essential Oils & Plant Extracts
Compatible with Scentsy, Yankee Candle or standard electric tart warmers - 3 oz each - With 6 break away blocks for multiple uses - Multiple Scents available. Please see our other listings.
Scent: Caramelized Pralines: A blend of sweet warm vanilla caramel, dark brown sugar w/ butter-drenched pecans
Paraffin Free - Phthalate Free - No added synthetic dyes or harmful chemicals - Non-Toxic
Highly scented with quality oils - Vegan & Never tested on animals
description: Each candle/wax melt creation relies on several hours of intense crafting in a process that utilizes many steps. Each step in the process brings us closer to completion with the final creation shown here. The last stop is of course your home or office. Leaving your home or office with wonderful natural scents lasting for hours. ----- Shipping: Items will be sent via USPS. Orders are filled Monday-Friday. Our offices are closed Saturday, Sunday and Holidays. Please allow 1 business day processing time. During warmer weather candles and tarts may soften. This is normal. Simply allow your item to cool before use. No international shipping at this time. We do ship to Alaska, Puerto Rico, and Hawaii. ----- Cautions: Keep out of reach of children and pets. Melted wax gets very hot and can cause burns, please use caution when handling hot wax. Allow candles, wax and wax warmer to cool before moving, covering or removing wax. This product contains oils that may cause damage to fabrics and other surfaces. Store in a cool dry place.
